name: Alessandro Armando
bio: Alessandro Armando is professor and Head of the Computer Security Laboratory at DIBRIS, University of Genoa.  He is also deputy director of the National Cybersecurity Laboratory of CINI.

name: Giovanni Lagorio
bio: Giovanni Lagorio is interested in ethical hacking, in particular binary reverse engineering and exploitation. He is also a co-founder of ZenHack, and a local organizer of CyberChallenge.IT.

name: Enrico Russo
bio: Enrico Russo is a  Ph.D. candidate in Computer Science and Systems Engineering at the University of Genova. His research activity is focused on Cyber Range systems. He also co-founded ZenHack and is personally involved in different live-fire cyber exercises as a member of the Green/Blue team.

name: Andrea Valenza
description: Software Security Consultant @ IMQ Minded Security
bio: Web Security enthusiast. CTF player and Co-Founder of ZenHack. PhD Candidate @ UniGe
